title: Six minutes with nature
brief_description: The life cycle of a butterfly known as “The Wanderer” showing the egg, caterpillar, eating, chrysalis and final emergence of the butterfly. This film won a special award for the best nature film in the Commonwealth Jubilee Film Competition.
